Hi support,


I hope you're doing well. I wanted to report an issue we've encountered since rolling out Endpoint Protector 6.2.4.200 to all our devices last Thursday. I wanted to reach out to see if this is something you have witnessed in the past, or if you have any insight into what might be causing this issue.
